Text: A good example of the way skin ages due to exposure to sunlight over time.  Her skin is mostly aged on her face and arms, but is relatively young looking elsewhere.  If she'd been able to stay out of the sun all her life, she'd look like a 30 year old today.  Stay out of the sun, folks!
Too true....and I live on an island where temperature never really goes below 20C..u see it everyday
